import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Generate VP"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/identities/{identityId}/gen-presentation"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Generate a verifiable presentation for the corresponding identity.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"identityId","in":"path","description":"ID of the identity used to generate the presentation","required":true,"schema":{"type":"number"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["payload"],"properties":{"challenge":{"description":"Challenge of the verifier","type":"string"},"ethSignature":{"description":"Optional challenge signature using the wallet's private key to embed in the presentation","type":"string"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Verifiable presentation generated.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"presentation":{"description":"The verifiable presentation in JWT format","type":"string"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
